content: The future will not be built through force, nor the desire to conquer, but by the patient application of the democratic method, the constructive spirit of agreement, and by respect for freedom.
translations: ita:Il futuro non verr√† costruito con la forza, nemmeno con il desiderio di conquista ma attraverso la paziente applicazione
